channel.title: ChatGPT Reminders
channel.description: Live feed of reminders generated by ChatGPT for Sam

item.title: Get 4 dozen donuts for 6th & 7th grade band
item.description: Pick up donuts by 6:30am to cover 38 kids (19 in each class) with 10 extras.

item.title: Go to the bank after school
item.description: Deposit cash. Reminder for Friday afternoon.

item.title: Message Skip
item.description: Low priority, but must be done before Monday (April 14).

item.title: Make 4 extra BandMan37 reels
item.description: Finish by Monday to have posts ready for your trip.
